biotools.summary: Web based prediction server for anticancer peptides. SVM models developed are based on amino acid composition and binary profile features. Positive dataset consists of 225 antimicrobial peptides with anticancer properties.

bioschemas.name: AntiCP
bioschemas.summary: Web based prediction server for anticancer peptides. SVM models developed are based on amino acid composition and binary profile features. Positive dataset consists of 225 antimicrobial peptides with anticancer properties.
